name: Lotos Quazar Dynamic 508/509 SAE 0W-20
description: Lotos Quazar Dynamic 508/509 SAE 0W-20 is the first product in this range, ultra-modern, specialized, synthetic engine oil. With the Hi-Tec Protection Plus formula, it guarantees complete and permanent anti-wear protection to the selected state-of-the-art engines manufactured by VW (since 2016), both with petrol and self-ignition, in all operating conditions.
